project.name: composure-hx
project.description:
A haxe library to assist coding in a composition design pattern. The library also allows for dependency injection via metadata.
Intro to Composure - with Hello World
Composure Wiki
Generated Documentation
project.version:
Separated 'utils' package out into:
'traitChackers' which create utility functions for use on Injectors
'utilTraits' which are core traits used to perform fundamental functions
